questions.question: Which substituent contributes 12 nm to λmax when present at the β-position in α, β-unsaturated ketones?

explanations.b: Correct: Alkyl groups contribute 12 nm in β-position.
explanations.d: Incorrect: –NH2 contributes 13 or 58 nm depending on position.

questions.question: What is the base value for a 6-membered cyclic α, β-unsaturated ketone?

explanations.d: Incorrect: 214 nm is for acyclic ketones.

questions.question: Which group contributes the most (85 nm) to λmax in para position of an aromatic system?
Which statement is true about exocyclic double bonds in the Woodward–Fieser system?

answers.b: They have no effect on λmax

explanations.a: Incorrect: They increase λmax, not decrease.
explanations.b: Incorrect: They do contribute to λmax.
explanations.c: Correct: Each exocyclic double bond adds 5 nm.
explanations.d: Incorrect: They apply to dienes and ketones too.
